name: Crump Rush
description:
In Crump Rush your weapon gives you the mobility you need complete each level as quickly as possible. Use it's magnetizing capabilities to throw yourself and destroy the ground beneath you to propel yourself across the map.

Compete against the developer by beating his times.

If you are on Ludum Dare, you can rate the game here.

CONTROLS:
WASD - Movement
Left Click - Magnet
Right Click - Laser

Credit to Zack Davidson for Composing the Music
